metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Remove from heat and let sit for a few minutes.
Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey.
Simmer for a few minutes until heated through.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Remove from heat and let sit for a few minutes.
Bake for 60 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Bake for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey.
Simmer for a few minutes until heated through.
